title: Yasuo since Marksman Update
body:
Anybody else noticing yasuo is actually stronger in this update?

A short rundown:
-He gets 100% crit with two items, {{item:3087}} {{item:1018}}. This is insane as before you had to build 2 full items ({{item:3031}} {{item:3087}}) and a mini item {{item:3086}}  to reach cap.
-He gets +15% lifesteal from crit. If you can farm well, by 10-15 minutes you should have 17% lifesteal with masteries alone, let alone runes.
-Bloodthirster is no longer unique, so if you're fed, you can grab two bloodthirsters and enjoy ~57% lifesteal. This is insane.
-He now deals even MORE damage to tanks than before with {{item:3036}}. Yasuo doesn't build health. He is a skirmisher and so has no HP and will melt anybody that has taken {{item:3027}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3151}}.
-maybe a few other things, I haven't gotten to get through full builds yet as i usually either end the game at 20 minutes with a surrender from our team due to a fed enemy adc, or a surrender from enemy team from our adc being too fed.

What are your thoughts? Anybody tested any of the melee crit based champions? I'm looking forward to playing Gangplank and Master Yi.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
